entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
